function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Literature search may have missed relevant articles due to specific search terms or exclusion criteria.","Impact":"Potential bias in the review if important studies are not included.","Mitigation":"Broaden the search criteria to include additional relevant terms and languages. Use a secondary search method to capture any missed articles.","Technologies":"Data mining and natural language processing tools for comprehensive literature search.","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and stakeholders relying on the scoping review for information.","Owner":"Research team conducting the scoping review."},{"Description":"Inaccurate data extraction and synthesis leading to incorrect conclusions and recommendations.","Impact":"Misinformation and inappropriate actions based on flawed evidence.","Mitigation":"Implement a rigorous data validation process and use standardized data extraction methods. Utilize AI algorithms for data analysis and synthesis.","Technologies":"Data validation software, AI-powered analytics tools.","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and decision-makers relying on the study's conclusions and recommendations.","Owner":"Research team conducting the scoping review."},{"Description":"Language and communication barriers may lead to exclusion of valuable non-English articles that contain important insights.","Impact":"Missed opportunities to include valuable data and perspectives from non-English literature.","Mitigation":"Engage multilingual researchers or translation services to review non-English articles. Use AI-powered translation tools for language translation.","Technologies":"AI-based translation software, multilingual reviewers.","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and stakeholders relying on the scoping review for information. Non-English speaking researchers and contributors.","Owner":"Research team conducting the scoping review."}]}
